Articles.Content:
True! I am a sixth generation American.

The user below me just got out of bed.

False. I don't even know what Skylon is, so I don't have an opinion about it.

Quite frankly, I didn't expected this inside the KSP community. Hopefully we can swiftly correct you misinformation.

And, no, I'm not.

Nop. It's 3pm here, I just got my lunch.

The user below me actually works on a space program.

Edited May 2, 2014 by BadLeo

Well, I am dreaming about becoming a aerospace engineer...

The user below me tortures kerbals for fun.

False...

*hears kerbals screaming behind closed door*

*walks to door, it opens, shoots an SRB, it closes, turns around, and smiles*

the user below me has multiple windows open on his computer right now

True, it was getting pretty warm in there, so I opened a few windows on it. That's how it works, right?

The user below me is eagerly anticipating the 0.24 update.

Uh, no kidding. OF COURSE WE ALL ARE!!!!!

The user below me prefers Xbox to PlayStation.

Yup.

The user below me is going to make a statement beginning with "The user below me".

Yes, because it is inevitable.

The user below me has KSP on Steam.

True.

The user below me will not post a picture of himself.

0 _ O

True.

The user below me has a siggy.

Indeed I do.

The user below me has flown an SSTO in KSP.

True, well sorta... first test flight failed due to the OMS being off-center.

The user below me has seen a rocket launch.

(For the record, I meant that I didn't know that Brazil didn't speak Spanish)

Nope. I really want to, though.

The user below me owns a business.

Lolno I'm 15. Give it a month or two when I finish my exams .

The user below me also has exams/finals.

What are these "exams" of which you speak?

The user below me has a pet. Any kind.

Yes. I have a dog. What do I'm talking about? I AM the pet.

The user below me is adult.

False.

The user after me is a vegan Christian I hope.

False (on one count): I am eating a chicken potpie right now.

The user below me has gone sailing at some point in their life.

I've been on a boat, but it wasn't a sailboat.

The user below me is 9001% ossum.

The user after me is a vegan Christian I hope.
I hope.

Hm.

The user below me is 9001% ossum.

True, I lost the P when I was playing dead to avoid a vulture.

The user below me is approximately 98.7% primate.

No. I'm 100% feline.

The user below me is a conspicuous meat eater and a Buddhist. And hypocrite.

That is doubly contradictory and entirely false.

The user below me is not currently cold, unlike myself.

true, because i am suffering headaches which only happen when i am in a room that is way too warm

the user below me is also suffering headaches

True, I was suffering from headaches a few hours ago, due to cold.

The user below me recently built a rocket in KSP.

False, i play KSP Spaceplane style!

The user below me plays KSP RSS style.
